tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Submissions (
  submission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  submission_text TEXT,
  submission_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PlagiarismDetect (
  detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  submission_id1 INT,
  submission_id2 INT,
  plagiarism_score DECIMAL,
  detection_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (submission_id1) REFERENCES Submissions(submission_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (submission_id2) REFERENCES Submissions(submission_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Students (student_id INT, student_name VARCHAR(255), submission_text TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Submissions (submission_id INT, student_id INT, submission_date DATE, plagiarism_score FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE PlagiarismReports (report_id INT, submission_id INT, plagiarism_detected BOOL);
CREATE TABLE DetectionHistory (detection_id INT, submission_id INT, detection_date TIMESTAMP, detection_method VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE Submissions (
    submission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    assignment_id INT,
    submission_date DATE,
    submission_text TEXT
);
